Title: Zaditor Antihistamine Eye Care Allergy Eye Drops, (5 ml bottle)
Body (HTML):
Unlike most over-the-counter eye drops, SYSTANE® ZADITOR® is the original triple-action, prescription strength formula that works in minutes to deliver up to 12 hours of eye itch relief. And unlike oral medications, SYSTANE® ZADITOR® targets itchy eyes right at the source.

- Fast-acting, long-lasting eye itch relief
- Original prescription strength
- Can be used by adults and children ages 3 and up


Frequently Asked Questions



Q: Can I use Systane Zaditor Eye Drops with contact lenses? 
A: According to the labeling, when using this product:


• Remove contact lenses before use • Wait at least 10 minutes before reinserting contact lenses after use



Q: Is Systane Zaditor also a lubricant eye drop? 
A: No. Systane Zaditor is not a lubricant eye drop. Systane Zaditor is indicated for use to temporarily relieve itchy eyes due to pollen, ragweed, grass, animal hair and dander.


Q: Is it safe to use Systane Zaditor while using other eye products throughout the day? 
A: We recommend that consumers consult their eye care professionals and/or allergists to determine which eye drops can be used in combination, as well as the appropriate way to use them.


Q: Is Systane Zaditor only for eye allergies? 
A: Systane Zaditor is indicated to temporarily relieve itchy eyes due to pollen, ragweed, grass, animal hair and dander.

Title: ZocuFoam Eyelid Cleanser and Moisturizer (3 Month Supply)
Body (HTML):
About Zocular
Okra Limited, founded by Dr. Peter Pham and the distributor for Zocular® products, is the first and only company to pioneer the use of a refined extract of Abelmoschus esculentus (aka Hibiscus esculentus), commonly known as okra, for your eyes and face in its products. Our proprietary okra-based formulation gives Zocular products their distinctive premium quality and effectiveness.Zocular products contain our unique okra-infused Zocusome micelles that gently lift and clear the oil, debris, and residue on your eyelid margins to make your eyes and skin appear more natural and healthy.
About ZocuFoam
ZocuFoam™ cleanser and moisturizer delivers the soothing and calming action of our patented Zokrex™ platform with activated natural okra complexes along with the deep cleansing power of micellar Zocusomes™. It’s pH balanced for the ocular surface and has been clinically shown to be effective against Demodex.
Instructions for use 

Place foam onto fingertips.
Gently scrub closed eyelids and/or face for 15 seconds. Leave foam on for another 30-40 seconds. Avoid direct eye contact.
Rinse with water.

Ingredients
Water, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Decyl Glucoside, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hibiscus Esculentus (Okra), Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Caffeine, Sodium Phytate, Glycerin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance.

Title: ZocuShield Gel (100+ applications) Stye and Chalazion Treatment
Body (HTML):
ZocuShield Advanced Eyelid Gel with Zokrex

Gel with micellar okra complexes
Easy-style applicator
Contains 10mL (0.34 fl oz)

Description
About Zocular
Okra Limited, founded by Dr. Peter Pham and the distributor for Zocular® products, is the first and only company to pioneer the use of a refined extract of Abelmoschus esculentus (aka Hibiscus esculentus), commonly known as okra, for your eyes and face in its products. Our proprietary okra-based formulation gives Zocular products their distinctive premium quality and effectiveness. Zocular products contain our unique okra-infused Zocusome micelles that gently lift and clear the oil, debris, and residue on your eyelid margins to make your eyes and skin appear more natural and healthy.
 
About ZocuShield
Advanced Gel Therapy with High Efficacy for Tough Cases
When clinical results matter, doctors turn to ZocuShield™ gel. Each ZocuShield syringe contains 10 ml of gel that delivers micellar okra complexes to provide superior clinical outcome. Just one drop of gel is all it takes to see and feel the difference for your eyes. 
Instructions for use

Apply a thin strip of ZocuShield gel across the lower eyelid.
Close the eyelids and massage the gel over the lash and eyelids using gentle circular motions.
Repeat for the other eye.

Caution
Discontinue use if irritation or allergic symptoms occur.
Ingredients
Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Decyl Glucoside, Carboxymethyl Cellulose, Glycerin, Sodium Phytate, Caffeine, Hibiscus Esculentus (Okra), Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Title: ZocuWipe Eyelid Cleaner and Moisturizer - 30 Count
Body (HTML):
ZocuWipe

Gentle eyelid cleansing and moisturizing wipes
Contains activated okra complex
No rinsing needed
Box of 30 individually wrapped wipes

Description
About Zocular
 
Okra Limited, founded by Dr. Peter Pham and the distributor for Zocular® products, is the first and only company to pioneer the use of a refined extract of Abelmoschus esculentus (aka Hibiscus esculentus), commonly known as okra, for your eyes and face in its products. Our proprietary okra-based formulation gives Zocular products their distinctive premium quality and effectiveness. Zocular products contain our unique okra-infused Zocusome micelles that gently lift and clear the oil, debris, and residue on your eyelid margins to make your eyes and skin appear more natural and healthy.
 
About Zocuwipe
Get immediate and long-lasting results with ZocuWipe™ . Contains our patent-pending Zokrex platform with activated okra complex. The power of okra is now in the palm of your hands. Convenient single-use pad that requires no rinsing.
Instructions for use

Open package and unfold ZocuWipe towelette into a rectangle. Wrap towelette over fingers. Remove any makeup, mascara, or moisturizer around eyes prior to applying ZocuWipe. Ocuse ZocuWipe in the morning.
Gently close eyelids and lightly scrub along the eyelash line using horizontal motion for 10-15 seconds until tiny white foam bodies called Zocusomes form. Avoid direct eye contact.
Flip ZocuWipe towelette to the other side and repeat similar steps for the other eye. Use a fresh, new ZocuWipe if Zocusomes do not form. 
Do not rinse after applying ZocuWipe. Follow routine skin regimen after applying ZocuWipe.

Ingredients
Water, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Decyl Glucoside, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil, Citrus Unshiu Peel Extract, Hibiscus Esculentus (Okra), Caffeine, Sodium Phytate, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lactate, Potassium Chloride, Calcium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance.
